Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $18000. I believe this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
